title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 25/84 of 5 January 1984 fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1984 accounting year for the purposes of the Farm Accountancy Data Network
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 25/84
of 5 January 1984
fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1984 accounting year for the purposes of the Farm Accountancy Data Network
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The standard fee paid by the Commission to Member States for each duly completed farm return is hereby fixed at 73 ECU for the 1984 accounting year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply for the 1984 accounting year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 January 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 109, 23. 6. 1965, p. 1859/65.
(2) OJ No L 210, 30. 7. 1981, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 190, 14. 7. 1983, p. 25.
(4) OJ No 213, 23. 11. 1966, p. 3637/66.
(5) OJ No L 205, 13. 7. 1982, p. 10.
